track.name: Big Freeze
comments: For me, the best music of T2L...!

Good. I'm glad to see I'm not the only one who heard U2 in this one big time. I think that's why I like it so much....

Sorry Muse fans ;)
REALLY love this song! "The 2nd Law" is such a good album!
I like it. It simply makes me smile. [2]
too good for a U2 song, but still bad for a good Muse song
I like it. It simply makes me smile.
One of the absolute BEST on the BEST ALBUM of THE YEAR BAR NONE.
even though you guys are right, because it DOES stink like U2, but somehow I like it
This one is definitely the worst. Sheryl Crow + U2
this is the first song that got me from The 2nd Law
and this one is absolutely u2
Don't let the sun in your heart decay!
his screaming during second chorus is just awesome! love this song and its intensity
